data.text: Fabulous hotel in a great location. Within walking distance of major attractions. Great staff throughout the hotel, friendly and helpful.  Delux garden room plenty big enough for 3 adults.  3rd bed is a sofa bed but a good sofa bed.  Water replenished in the room every day.  Nespresso machine in the room.  Breakfast, good choice of continental and hot food.   Very clean everywhere. Would recommend this hotel and would stay again.
data.title: Great hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear KarenC8998

Thank you so much for your positive comments about your last experience at H10 Casa Mimosa! We are very happy to know that our staff's attention, service and facilities were beyond your expectations.

On behalf of the entire team we look forward to giving you our warmest welcome back.

Our kindest regards,

H10 Casa Mimosa team
owner_response.author: Elisabet Folguera Quero

data.text: Great hotel in a fab location.  Within walking distance of all major sites.  Wonderful staff everywhere, all very friendly and helpful.  Lovely breakfast with good choices of continental and cooked.  Delux garden room was a good size for three adults.  Water replenished every day.  Lovely stay, would recommend and would stay again.
data.title: Great hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tourist06633051388

It is truly a pleasure to receive such positive feedback from your recent stay with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our service, location and gastronomic offer. 

Thank you very much, indeed, for taking some of your time to write about your experience, we will pass on your comments to the rest of the team. 

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the nearest future,

Sincerely,

H10 Casa Mimosa team
owner_response.author: Elisabet Folguera Quero

data.text: We very much liked this hotel  It's in the Grazia section of Barcelona, only one block from the metro and shopping.  It is very close to La Pedrada (Gaudi building.)  We were able to walk everywhere from the hotel.  Our room was a deluxe garden room which was spacious with lots of light.  The hotel has an amazingly fresh breakfast buffet available with a vast selection of local items.  Coffee is amazing and is made with a real, fresh ground coffee (not a pod).  Would definitely stay here again.  Felt welcoming, safe and clean.
data.title: Great hotel a little away from chaos of Rambla but centrally located

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MamaK279,

First and foremost, thank you for trusting and choosing H10 Casa Mimosa for your most awaited visit to Barcelona.

The hotel is located at the very heart of Gr√†cia, a small but very traditional district of Barcelona filled with local restaurants and bars.
Although some of the interesting points are walkable, we are also pretty well connected to all Barcelona Metropolitan thanks to its marvelous public transportation.
We are very pleased to know that the room's features met your expectations. Since most of the rooms are facing towards an open courtyard natural sunlight is very accessible to them.
Restaurant selection for breakfast is kindly complete and our staff is hugely delighted to assist our guests for any doubts and questions they might have.

We are overall extremely happy that you had an amazing experience in H10 Casa Mimosa.

We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Kind regards,

H10 Casa Mimosa team
owner_response.author: Elisabet Folguera Quero

data.text: An exceptional hotel, in the perfect location, with wonderful members of staff who made our stay one to remember! There are so many hotels in Barcelona that it's hard to choose when looking online, but I can 100% recommend the H10 Casa Mimosa. The outside space is beautiful and offers a tranquil space that allows you to escape the hustle and bustle of the city at the end of a busy day exploring. The rooms are quiet, spacious and offer everything you would expect from a top class hotel.  Our flight home was cancelled last minute and we needed to stay another night, the staff were fantastic and managed to arrange another night without even needing to move rooms.  We will definitely be returning!
data.title: Top Class Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear katieeX8863FT,

Thank you for your review! We are glad that you appreciated our attention to detail, relaxing atmosphere and exceptional service.

We always attempt for great hospitality and reading positive feedback like yours is our guide that we are heading in the right direction.

Thank you once again for your interest in H10 Casa Mimosa. 

We look forward to welcoming you back again for another memorable stay in Barcelona.

Warm regards,

H10 Casa Mimosa team
owner_response.author: Elisabet Folguera Quero

data.text: We spent almost a week with family and enjoyed some warm great hospitality. The location is perfect close to all key sights, the building and its courtyard, terraces and roof are beautifully merging traditional vs modern design elements, rooms are spacious and quiet, service is proactive and warm, we had some relaxing famiky breakfast and the restaurant team Mr Matteo, Ms Eleonora, Ms Cristina was exceptional for their efficiency, consideration, patience and warmth.
data.title: Ourstanding

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Robert G,

Above all we would like to thank you for choosing H10 Casa Mimosa and for taking the time to write a review on Tripadvisor.

We are very pleased to know that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us and that you took advantage of the location to visit the key sights in Barcelona.

The whole staff  always strives to provide the best, yet warm, service possible.  Matteo, Cristina and Eleonora are very happy  of you noticing their work. 

We look forward to welcoming you and your family back in the near future.

Best regards,

H10 Casa Mimosa Team
owner_response.author: Elisabet Folguera Quero
